method3: Prepare the cheese balls by combining milk, vinegar, and flour. Knead the mixture until it forms a dough, then shape it into small balls. Boil the balls in a mixture of water and sugar until they are cooked through. In another pot, heat milk, sugar, and cardamom until boiling. Add the cooked cheese balls to the milky mixture and let them soak for an hour or so. Garnish with chopped nuts and serve chilled.
